item.title: Uto-Aztecan Language Family
item.description: Author: IDCL Editor info-chart of the Uto-Aztecan Language Family #Uto-Aztecan Language Family this chart has been published @idclang instagram page Uto-Aztec Proto Branch Uto-Aztec Full Chart For enquiries, reach out to us through dclprogramme@gmail.com Follow us on Instagram | Youtube | Facebook
